Report on the building of LUTON UniversityLUTON University building
I heard that a group of AmericaAmerican students has just arrived in our town. I want to introduce an interesting building for them to visit.

It is the main building of LUTON University atin park squarePark Square. ThereIt is aan academic building. It inculdsincludes a labrarylibrary., II suit, academic rooms, a GYM Club and a restuarantrestaurant.

There is a very big labrarylibrary. You can find any information from it whatthat you want. AtFor the rest of the time, you can go to the IT suitsuite useto use the Internet. If you feel hungry, you don't need goto go out. Just atin the same building, you couldcan find a restuarantrestaurant.

I recommenrecommend this buidingbuilding to visitrecommend visiting this building. Because, because American students will know British students is how to study and different campus life. They can also talk with British students to communiatecommunicate study experience.
